author: quark2
body:
#### PR description:

This PR provides massive updates on GE21 onlineDQM/offlineDQM plots. This work is focusing on the division of GE21 information by modules (M1-M4). It is necessary because of the electronic configuration of GE21 chambers.

It is also included that the module information is propagated to the GEM unpacker in a better way, which is done by @yeckang.

This update was planned to be implemented in CMSSW_12_6_X (#39985), but it wasn't because this PR was merged "after" the 12_6 branch was detached from HEAD, unfortunately. This PR is a fix for this accident.

#### PR validation:

The updates are exactly the same as #39985, and the previous PR is already valid.

@jshlee @watson-ij @seungjin-yang @yeckang
title: [12_6_X] Updates on GE21 online/offlineDQM plots with division on modules
